ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'What do you think you were doing, Samiri?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses asked: "O Sameri, what was the matter?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "What, then, is your case, O Samiri?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses asked, "Samiri, what were your motives?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “And what is your explanation, O Samri?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Musa) said: "And what is the matter with you. O Samiri"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: What was then your object, O Samiri?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Moses said, 'And thou, Samaritan, what was thy business?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Moses) said: And what hast thou to say, O Samiri?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "What was the matter with you, Samiri?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Musa said: what was thy object, O Samiri?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘What is your business, O Samiri?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Moses) said: "What then is thy case, O Samiri?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Musa (Moses)] said: "And what is the matter with you. O Samiri? (i.e. why did you do so?)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You, Samaritan' said he (Moses), 'what was your business'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “What do you have to say, O Samarian?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:95] He said, ‘And what have you to say, what was the motive for [doing] what you did, O Samaritan?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Moses went to al-Samiri, and he (said: And what hast thou to say, Samiri?) What drove you to worship the calf, Samiri?
